rules: Rule1: If an employee attends training, then department productivity increases.
Rule2: Provided that an employee has internet access, a task is completed.

Rule3: Under the condition that an employee works overtime, then if a project has manager approval, it follows that whenever it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, a project deadline is missed.
Rule4: Either an employee works overtime or an employee works on the weekend.

Rule5: Should a manager call a team meeting, then whenever a project has an urgent deadline, then if an employee works on the weekend, then given that a project has manager approval, it implies that if it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, a project deadline is missed.

Rule6: Provided that a manager sends an email alert, then if a project has an urgent deadline, it follows that whenever an employee works on the weekend, then under the condition that a project has manager approval, then if it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, a project deadline is missed.
Rule7: Whenever an employee has a performance review, a manager calls a team meeting.
Rule8: Either an employee has a performance review or a manager evaluates a project.
Rule9: Under the condition that a department produces a quarterly report, then if a manager evaluates a project, a manager sends an email alert.
Rule10: Either a department produces a quarterly report or finance conducts a budget audit.
Rule11: Whenever a computer is broken, an employee is not distracted from work.
Rule12: Either a computer is broken or a printer is malfunctioning.
Rule13: An employee works remotely or an employee is in a meeting.
Rule14: If an employee is in a meeting, then an employee is not distracted from work.
Rule15: Whenever it is not the case that an employee works remotely, then an employee has internet access, then an employee is fired.

Rule16: If it is not the case that it is not the case that finance conducts a budget audit, then if a manager evaluates a project, a manager sends an email alert, then a warning is issued to an employee, then an employee's salary is reduced.

Rule17: Under the condition that it is not the case that it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, then a project deadline is missed, then an employee is promoted.

Rule18: If it is not the case that it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, then a project deadline is missed, then an employee is not promoted.

Rule19: Should it not be the case that it is not the case that it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, then a project deadline is missed, then an employee is granted a bonus, then an employee is under promotion review.

Rule20: Whenever it is not the case that it is not the case that it is not the case that a printer is malfunctioning, then an employee is not distracted from work, then a project deadline is missed, then an employee is granted a bonus, then an employee is not under promotion review.
Rule21: If an employee does not attend training, then an employee is distracted from work.
facts: Fact1: A project has manager approval.
Fact2: A project has an urgent deadline.
Fact3: It is not the case that an employee is fired.
Fact4: It is not the case that a warning is issued to an employee.
Fact5: An employee's salary is not reduced.
Fact6: An employee is not granted a bonus.
Fact7: A project deadline is not missed.
Fact8: A task is not completed.
